collection.name: Der Freischütz
collection.openText: This magical bullet truly can hit anyone you say!

specialTipSize.specialTip: You can proceed with the request for $0. At the time of the request, 10% of the current energy is consumed.
However, bullets that are fired after commissioning can penetrate all objects and cause damage. Also, The 7th bullet of $0 can't fire where you want it to, so you have to decide carefully.
#0, an employee whose Justice is below level 3 completed the $0 work, lowering the Qliphoth counter of $0.
When the work result was normal, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a normal probability.
When the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a high probability.
When Qliphoth counter reaches 0,$0 will fire a bullet by himself toward somewhere inside this facility.
